column4: Totally offtopic question, but hey, we're in a Linux channel so guess I could ask. If I create a GUID partition table, will Windows work on it?
I found my nickname is best completed with "thead"
Well, I'm not too lazy to type out "alias rtfm=man" in my bashrc just because that's so much fun xDD
Not really, just delete the stuff out of /usr/share/modules, mostly, and maybe some binaries from /usr/bin/
would know ;) I don't think emerge has any GUI frontends, does it?
You can, if you have another bootloader for your MBR
not seen you on in a while
It's like with English and Russian - you need to switch because you can't type English with the Russian layout and vice versa
